title: Eclipse Hunter - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Comedy   Drama   School Life   Sci-fi
tags: Androgynous Characters   Androids   Artificial Intelligence   Bodyguards   Brother Complex   Calm Protagonist   Doting Older Siblings   Human Experimentation   Male Protagonist   Naive Protagonist   Overprotective Siblings   Shounen-Ai Subplot   Tragic Past   Wealthy Characters

description:
The life of a cyborg, programmed to protect his overprotective older brother and ordered to conceal his identity from his classmates.

Part serious, part comedy; plot deepens as it goes on.>
